column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We went looking for good authentic deep-dish pizza and we're glad we found it at Lou Malnati's. We went there on a Saturday night and early (5:30) -- there was still a 45 minute wait then. But you can order your pizza ahead of time (it takes 35 minutes to cook) so by the time we sat down
column2: our pizza was nearly ready. Don't miss the Malnati salad as an app though - very good choice. Â
